name: Robots... Friend or Foe?
description:
In this action pack wallop of a game, play as both a robot and a small electric fella trying to navigate through the ol' scrap factory.

This was a game created for Global Game Jam 2018, with a few fixes added.

Global Game Jam Version:

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/robots-friend-or-foe

Controls:

Shooter Game -

W,A,S,D - Movement

Left Click - Shooting

Platforming Game -

Shoot the Jump Nixie tube to make the character jump.

Shoot the Duck Nixie tube to make the character duck.
